doc.title: Blue Tarp City
doc.plot: The ground-zero perspectives surrounding the native Hawaiian-houseless community in Wai'anae, HI on the island of Oahu. This unique community identifies aspects of indigenous dis-empowerment that instigates an informed dialogue toward the question, 'who are the homeless?' Part-take in acknowledging the dis-empowerment and criminalization surrounding this social epidemic that indigenous communities face globally by journeying into the Blue Tarp City.
